verses.text_madani: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِ أَنْ أَنذِرْ قَوْمَكَ مِن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Surely We sent Nuh to his people, saying: Warn your people before there come upon them a painful chastisement.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: He said: O my people! Surely I am a plain warner to you:

verses.text_madani: أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ وَاتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: That you should serve Allah and be careful of (your duty to) Him and obey me:

verses.text_madani: يَغْفِرْ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمْ وَيُؤَخِّرْكُمْ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ اللَّهِ إِذَا جَاءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ ۖ لَوْ كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: He will forgive you some of your faults and grant you a delay to an appointed term; surely the term of Allah when it comes is not postponed; did you but know!

verses.text_madani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُ قَوْمِي لَيْلًا وَنَهَارًا
verses.translation: He said: O my Lord! surely I have called my people by night and by day!

verses.text_madani: فَلَمْ يَزِدْهُمْ دُعَائِي إِلَّا فِرَارًا
verses.translation: But my call has only made them flee the more:

verses.text_madani: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوْتُهُمْ لِتَغْفِرَ لَهُمْ جَعَلُوا أَصَابِعَهُمْ فِي آذَانِهِمْ وَاسْتَغْشَوْا ثِيَابَهُمْ وَأَصَرُّوا وَاسْتَكْبَرُوا اسْتِكْبَارًا
verses.translation: And whenever I have called them that Thou mayest forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, cover themselves with their garments, and persist and are puffed up with pride:

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ إِنِّي دَعَوْتُهُمْ جِهَارًا
verses.translation: Then surely I called to them aloud:

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ إِنِّي أَعْلَنتُ لَهُمْ وَأَسْرَرْتُ لَهُمْ إِسْرَارًا
verses.translation: Then surely I spoke to them in public and I spoke to them in secret:

verses.text_madani: فَقُلْتُ اسْتَغْفِرُوا رَبَّكُمْ إِنَّهُ كَانَ غَفَّارًا
verses.translation: Then I said, Ask forgiveness of your Lord, surely He is the most Forgiving:

verses.text_madani: يُرْسِلِ السَّمَاءَ عَلَيْكُم مِّدْرَارًا
verses.translation: He will send down upon you the cloud, pouring down abundance of rain:

verses.text_madani: وَيُمْدِدْكُم بِأَمْوَالٍ وَبَنِينَ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ جَنَّاتٍ وَيَجْعَل لَّكُمْ أَنْهَارًا
verses.translation: And help you with wealth and sons, and make for you gardens, and make for you rivers.

verses.text_madani: مَّا لَكُمْ لَا تَرْجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا
verses.translation: What is the matter with you that you fear not the greatness of Allah?

verses.text_madani: وَقَدْ خَلَقَكُمْ أَطْوَارًا
verses.translation: And indeed He has created you through various grades:

verses.text_madani: أَلَمْ تَرَوْا كَيْفَ خَلَقَ اللَّهُ سَبْعَ سَمَاوَاتٍ طِبَاقًا
verses.translation: Do you not see how Allah has created the seven heavens, one above another,

verses.text_madani: وَجَعَلَ الْقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورًا وَجَعَلَ الشَّمْسَ سِرَاجًا
verses.translation: And made the moon therein a light, and made the sun a lamp?

verses.text_madani: وَاللَّهُ أَنبَتَكُم مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ نَبَاتًا
verses.translation: And Allah has made you grow out of the earth as a growth:

verses.text_madani: ثُمَّ يُعِيدُكُمْ فِيهَا وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ إِخْرَاجًا
verses.translation: Then He returns you to it, then will He bring you forth a (new) bringing forth:

verses.text_madani: وَاللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ الْأَرْضَ بِسَاطًا
verses.translation: And Allah has made for you the earth a wide expanse,

verses.text_madani: لِّتَسْلُكُوا مِنْهَا سُبُلًا فِجَاجًا
verses.translation: That you may go along therein in wide paths.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمْ عَصَوْنِي وَاتَّبَعُوا مَن لَّمْ يَزِدْهُ مَالُهُ وَوَلَدُهُ إِلَّا خَسَارًا
verses.translation: Nuh said: My Lord! surely they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children have added to him nothing but loss.

verses.text_madani: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا كُبَّارًا
verses.translation: And they have planned a very great plan.

verses.text_madani: وَقَالُوا لَا تَذَرُنَّ آلِهَتَكُمْ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدًّا وَلَا سُوَاعًا وَلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسْرًا
verses.translation: And they say: By no means leave your gods, nor leave Wadd, nor Suwa; nor Yaghus, and Yauq and Nasr.

verses.text_madani: وَقَدْ أَضَلُّوا كَثِيرًا ۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا ضَلَالًا
verses.translation: And indeed they have led astray many, and do not increase the unjust in aught but error.

verses.text_madani: مِّمَّا خَطِيئَاتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا فَأُدْخِلُوا نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا لَهُم مِّن دُونِ اللَّهِ أَنصَارًا
verses.translation: Because of their wrongs they were drowned, then made to enter fire, so they did not find any helpers besides Allah.

verses.text_madani: وَقَالَ نُوحٌ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرْ عَلَى الْأَرْضِ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ دَيَّارًا
verses.translation: And Nuh said: My Lord! leave not upon the land any dweller from among the unbelievers:

verses.text_madani: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرْهُمْ يُضِلُّوا عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوا إِلَّا فَاجِرًا كَفَّارًا
verses.translation: For surely if Thou leave them they will lead astray Thy servants, and will not beget any but immoral, ungrateful (children)

verses.text_madani: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
verses.translation: My Lord! forgive me and my parents and him who enters my house believing, and the believing men and the believing women; and do not increase the unjust in aught but destruction!
